text: Kim Carnes (born July 20, 1945) is an American singer. She is best known for the song "Bette Davis Eyes" (1981). Bette Davis liked the song. Carnes gave Davis a gold record. Bette Davis hung the gold record on a wall. ==References== ==Other websites== * Kim Carnes - Official Web Site * Kim Carnes Fan Club Web Site * Category:American folk musicians Category:Singers from Los Angeles Category:American pop musicians Category:Singer-songwriters from California Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Country musicians
title: Kim Carnes
